doc:
Peter Stephens (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Stephens_(actor) 0 Peter Stephens (3 January 1920 – 17 September 1972) was an English stage, film and television supporting actor, notable for his portrayal of the Bunteresque character Cyril in the Doctor Who serial The Celestial Toymaker. He was also the director of one film during his career. Peter_Stephens ( 3_January_1920 – 17_September_1972 ) was an_English_stage , film_and_television_supporting_actor , notable_for his_portrayal of the_Bunteresque_character_Cyril in the_Doctor Who_serial The_Celestial_Toymaker . He was also the_director of one_film during his_career .
